SEARCH

Class Solution

java.lang.Object
Solution
public class Solution extends Object
Represents a solution to a problem using a greedy algorithm to assign projects to students. Projects are assigned in a round-robin fashion, cycling through the available projects repeatedly.

Note: The current implementation may include null values in assignments if non-student persons (e.g., teachers) exist in the problem, as it does not properly filter students during processing.

  • Constructor Details

    • Solution

      public Solution(int SolutionID, String SolutionDescription, Problem problem)
      Constructs a solution for a problem using the greedy assignment algorithm.
      Parameters:
      SolutionID - the unique identifier for this solution
      SolutionDescription - a textual description of the solution approach
      problem - the problem to solve (contains students, teachers, and projects)
      See Also:
      • Initializes project assignments immediately

    • getAssignedStudents

      public Student[] getAssignedStudents()
      Gets the students assigned to projects. Warning: May contain null values if the problem included teachers.

    • getAssignedProjects

      public Project[] getAssignedProjects()
      Gets the projects assigned to students. The order matches the student array from getAssignedStudents().
      Returns:
      array of assigned projects
